extendedInfo.description: An application that defines your coordinates by GPS Using this application you can share your location with your friends in any convenient way. Also interesting the place to note for himself, exporting location in Google Doc.Handy app if you want to meet with friends in a public place, difficult address, or let's say somewhere in the park or near a lake where you have picknick.The application does not work in the background and do not share information about your location without your knowledge. It works only in active mode and with the recipients, which you Choose.You can export your contact information to such services:- Bluetooth;- Gmail;- Skype;- Google+;- Twitter;- VKontakte;- Facebook;- Google Docs;- Notepad.Number of services through which you can transfer data depends entirely on what applications are installed on your phone.

reviews.title: Works.
reviews.comment: Its asome but it should find  not tell.
reviews.author: syed rustam ali
